Label.en: While earlier I said the cells were horrible... there were some fancy ones!
Label.fr: While earlier I said the cells were horrible... there were some fancy ones!
Label.es: While earlier I said the cells were horrible... there were some fancy ones!
Label.zh: While earlier I said the cells were horrible... there were some fancy ones!

Label.en: Reserved for wealthy inmates, of course!
Label.fr: Reserved for wealthy inmates, of course!
Label.es: Reserved for wealthy inmates, of course!
Label.zh: Reserved for wealthy inmates, of course!

Label.en: This is the cell used to house Marie Antoinette!
Label.fr: This is the cell used to house Marie Antoinette!
Label.es: This is the cell used to house Marie Antoinette!
Label.zh: This is the cell used to house Marie Antoinette!

Label.en: Well... the end result was the same for the prisoners, however they were kept!

Label.zh: Well... the end result was the same for the prisoners, however they were kept!
